channel.title: Posts on Ruthless Physics
channel.description: Recent content in Posts on Ruthless Physics

item.title: Welcome
item.description: Welcome to Ruthless Physics Welcome to Ruthless Physics. I have tried on and off to start a blog about astrophysics and I am hoping this is here to stay. Why Ruthless Physics? The name “Ruthless” originates from my Grandma, Ruth. She has always been a big supporter and is always curious to learn more, much like myself. What is Ruthless Physics? The aim of this blog is to make astrophysics accessible.
